title: Gensokyo Party Vol. 6 Border in Stasis
price: Pre-Order & Event Price: 12€ / 2000 yen | Post Release Price: 15€ / 2500 yen

01.title: Autumn's Invitation
description: • Original Composer: U2 Akiyama [あきやまうに] (Twilight Frontier)
• Programmed, Produced & Mixed by dystopian tanuki
• Original Track: Heaven of Scarlet Perception [緋想天]
• Source: Touhou Hisouten ~ Scarlet Weather Rhapsody. [東方緋想天　～ Scarlet Weather Rhapsody.]
• About this track: An invitation faintly written in a scarlet leaf. Unkown sender, unknown destination, where does this lead to?

02.title: Miasmic~Entanglement
description: • Programmed, Produced, Mixed & Mastered by ak+q
• Additional Mastering: Very minor treble reduction
• Original Track: The Dark Blowhole [暗闇の風穴]
• Source: Touhou Chireiden ~ Subterranean Animism. [東方地霊殿　～ Subterranean Animism.]

• About this track: Touhou 11: Subterranean Animism has always been a soft spot for me, musically. The first few stage themes resonate with me and parallel some aspects of my own song writing. To be able to arrange The Dark Blowhole, the games first stage song, into an experimental and transformative work, is such a blessing. Please enjoy this piece of work and the complete compilation!

03.title: Cherry Blossom, You and I
description: • Original Track: Sakura, Sakura ~ Japanize Dream... [さくらさくら　～ Japanize Dream...]
• Source: Touhou Youyoumu ~ Perfect Cherry Blossom. [東方妖々夢　～ Perfect Cherry Blossom.]

• Used VSTs & Samples: VST: Spire, Serum, Sylenth1, Keyzone Classic. / Noticeable Samples: - SOLTAN_MR_120_perc_loop_ruler - HNS4 Loops 32 145 BPM - AHEH Impact 11 170BPM - VEDM Uplifter 10 D 8 Bars_2 - etc.

04.title: Hidden Gateway
description: • Original Track: The Concealed Four Seasons [秘匿されたフォーシーズンズ] / Secret God Matara ~ Hidden Star in All Seasons. [秘神マターラ　～ Hidden Star in All Seasons.]
• Source: Touhou Tenkuushou ~ Hidden Star in Four Seasons. [東方天空璋　～ Hidden Star in Four Seasons.]
• About this track: According to the theme, I was aiming for a decadent, corrupt and sensational mood. [アルバムのテーマに合わせて、退廃的で扇情的な雰囲気をめざしました。]

05.title: Rampancy
description: • Original Track: Spiritual Domination ~ Who done it! [妖々跋扈　～ Who done it!]
• Source: Touhou Youyoumu ~ Perfect Cherry Blossom. [東方妖々夢　～ Perfect Cherry Blossom.]

06.title: Gensokyo;Restoration
description: • Programmed, Produced, Mixed & Mastered by takehirotei
• Original Track: Emotional Skyscraper ~ Cosmic Mind [感情の摩天楼　～ Cosmic Mind]
• Source: Touhou Seirensen ~ Undefined Fantastic Object. [東方星蓮船　～ Undefined Fantastic Object.]
• Used VSTs & Samples: Serum, 3x Osc, DSK Music Box, Massive X, Kontakt 7

title.jp: ツイノモト、モトノハテ

description: • Programmed, Produced & Mixed by Emelia K.
• Original Track: Iris [アイリス] / Eastern Strange Discourse [東方怪奇談]
• Source: Touhou Rei'iden ~ Highly Responsive to Prayers. [東方靈異伝　～ Highly Responsive to Prayers.]

• Used VSTs & Samples: Surge XT, Podolski / DtBlkFx, ThingsTexture, deletr, Crusher, AMBEO Orbit / mhak, Bandstand, Digital Underglow, VSCO2, Glitch With Friends, OtowabiKagurasuzu, Emilyguitar, SGM V2.01, Future Funkstep, SCC Taiko Drums, Freesound (556521)
• About this track: There was where the end began; the end of where it all began.

08.title: No Justice
description: • Original Track: Eastern Judgement in the Sixtieth Year ~ Fate of Sixty Year [六十年目の東方裁判　～ Fate of Sixty Years]
• Source: Touhou Kaeidzuka ~ Phantasmagoria of Flower View. [東方花映塚　～ Phantasmagoria of Flower View.]

09.title: Decryption of The Lost Era
description: • Programmed, Produced, Mixed & Mastered by GOETIΛ (Sigillum Azoetia)
• Original Track: Bibliophile with a Deciphering Eye [判読眼のビブロフィリア]
• Source: Touhou Suzunaan ~ Forbidden Scrollery. [東方鈴奈庵　〜 Forbidden Scrollery.]

10.title: Phantasmal Sojourner
description: • Programmed, Produced, Mixed & Mastered by tenko
• Original Track: Illusionary White Traveler [幻想のホワイトトラベラー]
• Source: Touhou Tenkuushou ~ Hidden Star in Four Seasons. [東方天空璋　～ Hidden Star in Four Seasons.]
Genre: Experimental, Artcore, Neurofunk, Gothic Hardcore, Botanica

11.title: reclamation: luna
description: • Programmed, Produced, Mixed & Mastered by baeddelite
• Original Track: Gensokyo Millennium ~ History of the Moon [千年幻想郷　～ History of the Moon]
• Source: Touhou Eiyashou ~ Imperishable Night. [東方永夜抄　～ Imperishable Night.]

12.title: e_4: universe ? twogirls ! wheelchair \Rightarrow \emptyset
description: • Original Track: Greenwich in the Sky / The Wheelchair's Future in Space [天空のグリニッジ / 車椅子の未来宇宙]
• Source: Magical Astronomy -ZUN's Music Collection vol.5- [大空魔術　～ Magical Astronomy]
• Used VSTs & Samples: uhh my own uni assignment video but reversed + my groupmates recordings but reversed

• About this track: originally just wanted to go for an ominous vibe since I've always wanted to make something like this, but as I finished the first 2 mins I realised I could add a "very empty space where they (renko and maribel) found a casette talking out the secrets of the universe" or smth. I was supposed (or well, planned) to record me reciting probably one of Stephen Hawking's speeches to fit into the casette vibe, but I guess reversed mumbling fits better in the end. Anyways hope you guys like it.
Genre: hi I tried to make stuff

13.title: Hell's Greatest Demon
description: • Original Track: The Deviants' Unobstructed Light ~ Kingdom of Nothingness. [逸脱者達の無礙光　〜 Kingdam of Nothingness.]
• Source: Touhou Juuouen ~ Unfinished Dream of All Living Ghost. [東方獣王園 〜 Unfinished Dream of All Living Ghost.]

14.title: The Forgotten Eternal Capital
description: • Original Track: The Frozen Eternal Capital [凍り付いた永遠の都]
• Source: Touhou Kanjuden ~ Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom. [東方紺珠伝　～ Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom.]

• About this track: The long-forgotten lunar capital, in all its solemn resplendence—shall we embark on a voyage to a place beyond the firmament, where the wind cries out to those bereaved, or left behind?
BPM: 35-43 (Timestamps are hard to fill in as the BPM is continuously modulating/the performance is quite humanized)
